name: Blown Forward
description:
Billie the bomb needs to go to the bathroom, and you have to help her! In the game, you go about exploding your environment to make progress. Explode yourself on thumbtacks, catapults, fans, fire, and mysterious goo to break flimsy bricks.

Play on fullscreen for a better experience.

This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam 3.
